package ComplexPkg;
typedef struct {
shortreal i, r;
} Complex;
function Complex add(Complex a, b);
add.r = a.r + b.r;
add.i = a.i + b.i;
endfunction
function Complex mul(Complex a, b);
mul.r = (a.r * b.r) - (a.i * b.i);
mul.i = (a.r * b.i) + (a.i * b.r);
endfunction
endpackage : ComplexPkg
